alert.note: Alert for Juneau Borough and Northern Admiralty Island; Taiya Inlet and Klondike Highway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 04 at 4:31AM AKST until January 04 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST TODAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. * WHERE...Juneau Borough and Northern Admiralty Island and Taiya Inlet and Klondike Highway. * WHEN...Until noon AKST today. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusts up to 60 mph continue near Downtown Juneau and Douglas. Near White Pass, wind chills as low as 50 below zero early Tuesday will cause rapid frostbite on exposed skin. Recent snow combined with blustery winds could further hamper travel with reduced visibility in blowing snow.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Juneau Borough and Northern Admiralty Island; Taiya Inlet and Klondike Highway
